article.title: General Atomics Resets Warrior Unmanned Aircraft Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Atomics Aeronautical Systems Incorporated, Poway, California, was awarded an $8,795,979 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the reset efforts for the Warrior A/Warrior Block 0 Unmanned Aircraft Systems. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
